entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 20 April 2023
